Amazing savings on clothing, shoes, fragrance, and accessories at Bath & Body Works, My Fashion Tees, Justice, Perfume & Gifts, Kirkland’s, Victoria’s Secret, Dillard’s, and more!

  • Mall-wide clearance sales and markdowns now 40%, 50%, even 75% OFF at select mall stores 
  • Saturday, July 15, 12 p.m. – 1 p.m. Visit with Rudolph and Frosty the Snowman at the Food Court
  • Free regular cookie from Great American Cookie Co. to first 100 guests Saturday, July 15. Just tell them Santa sent you!

Text SNOW to 444222 & enter to WIN our Christmas in July gift pack! Hurry in, Christmas in July sales event, July 14-16.

rue21 –  Shorts, graphic tees buy one get one 50% off. Skirts bogo $5. Fashion Tanks bogo $1. Clearance 50% OFF.
